meanings.definition: The quality or state of being anomalous.
meanings.sent1: The anomalousness of the situation puzzled everyone.
meanings.sent2: Her anomalousness in the group made her stand out.
meanings.sent3: The teacher chuckled at the anomalousness of the student's excuse.
meanings.sent4: The anomalousness of the weather patterns was like a puzzle to the meteorologists.
meanings.sent5: The anomalousness of the creature's appearance left a lasting impression on the researchers.

meanings.definition: The condition of being abnormal or irregular.
meanings.sent1: The doctor was concerned about the anomalousness of the test results.
meanings.sent2: The anomalousness of his behavior raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent3: The anomalousness of the cat's meow made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The anomalousness of the plant's growth was a topic of discussion among botanists.
meanings.sent5: The anomalousness of the sound in the forest made the hikers uneasy.
